message.body: How are you? Are you enjoying your time?
Yes! And I'm great!
Love you love you love you.
Love you too!
What's up. I am in class right now. Do you need help?
No everything is fine I was just checking in
K
I am done work and I am wondering when will you be home today?
Around 5
How are you getting home? Are you taking the train from Philly
Yes but if you wanted to pick me up that would be much appreciated :))))
Sorry I can't. Also I am going to a lecture at Bryn Mawr this evening. I am leaving the house at 5:45. Hope we can see other and touch base...
Can you pick me up from school?
Sorry honey I am in Bryn Mawr
Sid's welts have gotten SO BAD AND SO HUGE and he's bleeding all over my bed all the time we HAVE TO TAKE HIM TO THE VET
Also there's a deep hole in one of his welts I can't tell how far down it goes but it's leaking pus
And he's getting it all over the couch
When you get home!!
I did...they all say take your cat to the vet immediately if you see any scabs or pus

It's not about this one couch it's about the longterm he's bleeding on all of our furniture and I can't touch him and most of all he's probably in SO much pain!!!!!! This is not fair to him!! This is abnormal
They say wash the cat and put ointments but we can't wash him because he's too hurt and the ointment we get from the vet
Also feed him natural food and don't stress him ou
Out*
